name: Salvage Trader : a 2D space adventure
blurb: Explore the galaxy, complete missions, build your ship, fight pirates and do some trade. A 2D space adventure for Mac/Win8.

rewards.reward: OBSERVER\r\n\u2022 My eternal thanks for being supportive and believing in Salvage Trader.
GUILD PLEDGE\r\n\u2022 Digital download of the game, when version 1.0 is released.

GUILD APPLICANT
• Digital download of the game, once released.
• Your name on the credits page of the game website.
• Access to the development blog for special behind the scenes content!

CREW MEMBER
• Digital download of the game, once released.
• Your name on the credits page of the game website.
• Access to the development blog for special behind the scenes content!
• Beta Access! Get the game before it's finalized.
• Exclusive T-shirt!
